mapper.insert: insert into acc_board(ac_id,product_name, image, price,amount,info,brand_name) values (#{acid}, #{productname}, #{image}, #{price},#{amount}, #{info}, #{brandname})
mapper.select: select * from acc_board order by ac_id desc
mapper.update: update acc_board set product_name = #{productname}, image=#{image},price= #{price},amount = #{amount}, info=#{info},brand_name = #{brandname} where ac_id = #{acid}
